ModMetaData.name: Animal Cybernetics
ModMetaData.author: Trunken
ModMetaData.description: Animal Health Care & Prothestics This is a 6 kilobyte(!) blitz addon, which completely fills out all your needs on animal prothestics, with or without any other mod extension for that matter installed. Patches will only go off, when needed. While other mods add new items, this takes the vanilla Prothestics and treats them as both for animals and pawns. All parts are covered. Allows the installation of vanilla cybernetics on animals and makes specialized but loaded addons like 'A Dog Said' unnecessary. You can still keep and add these mods for more items, they won't interfere at all. New Wings and Tails are great! [FSF] VBE and EPOE are supported. Rare Archotech is excluded (in most cases). You want a hydraulic jaw on your Warg? Well, me too. This mod makes that possible. Based on Lulu's Animal Cybernetics, which dissappeared from the Workshop for some reason. I really loved it and wanted to bring it back to the family with this enhanced version. Hope you enjoy Credits Core & Idea * by Lulu Enhanced * by Trunken GFX * by Sekko Da Vinci List: Vanilla - Archotech Eye - Power Claw - Bionic Tail - Bionic Eye - Bionic Arm - Bionic Leg - Bionic Spine - BionicHeart - BionicStomach - BionicEar - Simple Prosthetic Leg - Simple Prosthetic Heart - CochlearImplant - PegLeg - Wooden Foot - Denture - Painstopper List: Expanded Prosthetics and Organ Engineering - Exp. Prosthetics + Prosthetic Table/Icons + AnyC Overview - Universally compatible with all animal mods! - Balanced and vanilla oriented - 100% savegame compatible - Can be easily deactivated again on a game in progress... and just adds animals on every described cybernetic/prothestic installation in the list.
